it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.utils.Observable<ServerEvent>
      • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.model.Game

  • public class Game
extends Observable<ServerEvent>
    Contains all of the informations about the game
    Author:
    Pietro L'Imperio

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame(boolean anticipatedFrenzy,
                      int typeMap,
                      boolean terminatorModeActive)
        Handles the beginning of the game with the initialization of its parameter and the creation of player boards for each player, map and killshot track. It creates moreover the powerUp deck, weapons deck and ammo tiles deck.
        Parameters:
        anticipatedFrenzy - The boolean value that indicate if there will be the last phase in frenzy mode
        typeMap - The type of map
        terminatorModeActive - The boolean value that indicate if there will be the terminator mode if the number of players is 3

      • startWithTheFirstTurn

        private void startWithTheFirstTurn()
        Sends the correct event towards the virtual view in accordance to the right phase of the game

      • updateMap

        void updateMap()
        Update the map and send an event of type MapEvent

      • createPlayer

        public void createPlayer(java.lang.String nickname,
                         boolean isFirst,
                         int position,
                         java.lang.String color)
        Creates player in accordance with the parameter
        Parameters:
        nickname - The nickname of the player
        isFirst - True if it is the first, false otherwhise
        position - The position in the round
        color - The color of the figure of the player
